attributes.action: equations given to pupils in 2023 GCSE exams
attributes.additional_details: We have lost critical learning in our syllabus that we will not be able to retrieve in time for our upcoming exams. Therefore, we are at a disadvantage to our former pupils at taking the same set of exams. At this time, we have been given no advanced information to aid us through these exams which we see as unfair and cruel.
attributes.background: I believe that it is unfair for pupils sitting their exams in 2023 to not have an equation sheet for maths and all sciences. It is not just the previous years that have suffered.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/611680
